product_name: Hincapie Sportswear Edge Bike Bib Shorts - Men's
long_description: The men's Hincapie Edge Bike Bib Shorts deliver ultimate performance, comfort and style as you ride, thanks to Hincapie fabric technologies. Moisture-wicking nylon/spandex bib shorts with 8-panel construction hug and move with your body for perfect fit. Schoeller(R) coldblack(R) finish technology reflects heat away from the body to regulate temperature, feels cool to the touch and provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Durable, super-opaque sublimation panels give a supple, supportive fit and also provide UPF 50+ sun protection. Soft, breathable power-stretch mesh upper dries quickly to regulate temperature. Sleek ProGrip(TM) comfort leg bands prevent legs from riding up. Seamless, anatomical, multi-density ProTour chamois offers perforated foam inserts for breathability and a center relief channel. Hincapie Edge Bike Bib Shorts for men feature a 10.25 in. inseam.
short_description: The men's Hincapie Edge Bike Bib Shorts deliver ultimate performance, comfort and style as you ride, thanks to Hincapie fabric technologies.
